mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.code AS "code", a.order_id as "dd.id", a.order_code AS "dd.code", a.order_no AS "orderno", a.cinvcode AS "cinvcode", a.cinvname AS "cinvname", a.cinvstd AS "cinvstd", a.unit AS "unit", a.routeid as "route.id", a.version as "route.version", a.start_date AS "startdate", a.end_date AS "enddate", a.scnum AS "scnum", a.gdnum AS "gdnum", a.synum AS "synum", a.dept AS "dept.id", a.status AS "status", dept.name AS "dept.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_jihua_gongdan( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, code, order_id, order_code, order_no, cinvcode, cinvname, cinvstd, unit,routeid,version, start_date, end_date, scnum, gdnum, synum, dept, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{dd.id}, #{dd.code}, #{orderno}, #{cinvcode}, #{cinvname}, #{cinvstd}, #{unit},#{route.id},#{route.version}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{scnum}, #{gdnum}, #{synum}, #{dept.id}, #{status} )
